actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO lddb.tickets (
	dataid,
	tickettitle,
	ticketnumber,
	businesssys,
	reporterid,
	businesscat,
	businesspriority,
	reoporttime,
	expectfinishtime,
	questiondes,
	ticketstatus,
	currentperson,
	reporterorg,
	createrid,
	creattime,
	actualtime,
	estimatedtime
)
VALUES (
	'{{appsmith.store.uniqueKey}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.ticketTitle}}',
	'{{appsmith.store.serialNumber}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.businessSys}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.reporterName}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.businessCat}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.businessPriority}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.reportTime}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.expectedTime}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.questionDetails}}',
	'新建',
	'{{createTicket.data.currentPerson.join()}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.main_Department}}'	,
	'{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}',
	'{{moment().format()}}',
	0,
	0
);

INSERT INTO lddb.tickets (
	dataid,
	tickettitle,
	ticketnumber,
	businesssys,
	reporterid,
	businesscat,
	businesspriority,
	reoporttime,
	expectfinishtime,
	questiondes,
	ticketstatus,
	currentperson,
	reporterorg,
	createrid,
	creattime,
	actualtime,
	estimatedtime
)
VALUES (
	'{{appsmith.store.uniqueKey}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.ticketTitle}}',
	'{{appsmith.store.serialNumber}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.businessSys}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.reporterName}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.businessCat}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.businessPriority}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.reportTime}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.expectedTime}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.questionDetails}}',
	'新建',
	'{{createTicket.data.currentPerson.join()}}',
	'{{createTicket.data.main_Department}}'	,
	'{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}',
	'{{moment().format()}}',
	0,
	0
);

actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE storage."tickets" SET
		"tickettitle" = '{{update_form.fieldState.tickettitle.isVisible ? update_form.formData.tickettitle : update_form.sourceData.tickettitle}}',
		"ticketnumber" = '{{update_form.fieldState.ticketnumber.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ticketnumber : update_form.sourceData.ticketnumber}}',
    "businesssys" = '{{update_form.fieldState.businesssys.isVisible ? update_form.formData.businesssys : update_form.sourceData.businesssys}}',
		"reportername" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reportername.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reportername : update_form.sourceData.reportername}}',
		"reporterid" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reporterid.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reporterid : update_form.sourceData.reporterid}}',
		"reporterorgid" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reporterorgid.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reporterorgid : update_form.sourceData.reporterorgid}}',
		"reporterorg" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reporterorg.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reporterorg : update_form.sourceData.reporterorg}}',
		"businesscat" = '{{update_form.fieldState.businesscat.isVisible ? update_form.formData.businesscat : update_form.sourceData.businesscat}}',
		"businesspriority" = '{{update_form.fieldState.businesspriority.isVisible ? update_form.formData.businesspriority : update_form.sourceData.businesspriority}}',
		"reoporttime" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reoporttime.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reoporttime : update_form.sourceData.reoporttime}}',
		"expectfinishtime" = '{{update_form.fieldState.expectfinishtime.isVisible ? update_form.formData.expectfinishtime : update_form.sourceData.expectfinishtime}}'
	WHERE "dataid" = {{data_table.selectedRow.dataid}};

UPDATE storage."tickets" SET
		"tickettitle" = '{{update_form.fieldState.tickettitle.isVisible ? update_form.formData.tickettitle : update_form.sourceData.tickettitle}}',
		"ticketnumber" = '{{update_form.fieldState.ticketnumber.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ticketnumber : update_form.sourceData.ticketnumber}}',
    "businesssys" = '{{update_form.fieldState.businesssys.isVisible ? update_form.formData.businesssys : update_form.sourceData.businesssys}}',
		"reportername" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reportername.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reportername : update_form.sourceData.reportername}}',
		"reporterid" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reporterid.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reporterid : update_form.sourceData.reporterid}}',
		"reporterorgid" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reporterorgid.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reporterorgid : update_form.sourceData.reporterorgid}}',
		"reporterorg" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reporterorg.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reporterorg : update_form.sourceData.reporterorg}}',
		"businesscat" = '{{update_form.fieldState.businesscat.isVisible ? update_form.formData.businesscat : update_form.sourceData.businesscat}}',
		"businesspriority" = '{{update_form.fieldState.businesspriority.isVisible ? update_form.formData.businesspriority : update_form.sourceData.businesspriority}}',
		"reoporttime" = '{{update_form.fieldState.reoporttime.isVisible ? update_form.formData.reoporttime : update_form.sourceData.reoporttime}}',
		"expectfinishtime" = '{{update_form.fieldState.expectfinishtime.isVisible ? update_form.formData.expectfinishtime : update_form.sourceData.expectfinishtime}}'
	WHERE "dataid" = {{data_table.selectedRow.dataid}};

actionConfiguration.body: Select nextnumber,prefix from lddb.counter where dataid = '10'
Select nextnumber,prefix from lddb.counter where dataid = '10'

SELECT tickettitle
	,ticketnumber
	,businesssys
	,reporterid
	,b.name AS reportername
	,reporterorg
	,businesscat
	,businesspriority
	,reoporttime
	,expectfinishtime
	,ticketstatus
	,agentid
	,a.currentperson
	,f.currentpersonname
	,avatar
FROM lddb.tickets AS a
LEFT JOIN lddb.users AS b ON a.reporterid = b.userid
LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT t.dataid,t.currentperson
		,GROUP_CONCAT(t1.name) AS currentpersonname
	FROM lddb.tickets t
	LEFT JOIN lddb.users t1 ON FIND_IN_SET(t1.userid, t.currentperson)
	GROUP BY t.dataid
	) AS f ON a.currentperson = f.currentperson and a.dataid = f.dataid
WHERE a.ticketstatus NOT IN ('已解决','已关闭','') or a.reporterid = '{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}'
ORDER BY ticketnumber DESC

SELECT tickettitle
	,ticketnumber
	,businesssys
	,reporterid
	,b.name AS reportername
	,reporterorg
	,businesscat
	,businesspriority
	,reoporttime
	,expectfinishtime
	,ticketstatus
	,agentid
	,a.currentperson
	,f.currentpersonname
	,avatar
FROM lddb.tickets AS a
LEFT JOIN lddb.users AS b ON a.reporterid = b.userid
LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT t.dataid,t.currentperson
		,GROUP_CONCAT(t1.name) AS currentpersonname
	FROM lddb.tickets t
	LEFT JOIN lddb.users t1 ON FIND_IN_SET(t1.userid, t.currentperson)
	GROUP BY t.dataid
	) AS f ON a.currentperson = f.currentperson and a.dataid = f.dataid
WHERE a.ticketstatus NOT IN ('已解决','已关闭','') or a.reporterid = '{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}'
ORDER BY ticketnumber DESC

update lddb.tickets set
     tickettitle ='{{ticketDetails.data.ticketTitle}}',
	   businesssys ='{{businessSys.selectedOptionValue}}',
	   businesscat ='{{businessCat.selectedOptionValue}}',
	   businesspriority ='{{businessPriority.selectedOptionValue}}',
	   expectfinishtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.expectedTime}}',
	   actualfinishtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.actualFinishTime}}',
	   ticketstatus ='{{ticketDetails.data.ticketStatus}}',
		  questiondes ='{{ticketDetails.data.questionDetails}}',
	   questionsolution ='{{ticketDetails.data.questionSolution}}',
	   currentperson ='{{currentPerson.selectedOptionValues.join()}}',
	   actualtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.actualTime}}',
	   estimatedtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.estimatedTime}}',
	   updaterid ='{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}',
	   updatetime ='{{moment().format()}}'
	where ticketnumber = '{{ticketDetails.data.ticketNumber}}'

select ticketnumber,concat(ifnull(agentname ,''),"于",ifnull(processtime ,''),ifnull(action ,''),ifnull(nextagentname,'')) as log from (select t.*, u.name as agentname ,GROUP_CONCAT(t1.name) as nextagentname  from lddb.ticket_logs t left join lddb.users u on t.agentid =u.userid left join lddb.users t1 on FIND_IN_SET(t1.userid, t.nextagentid) group by t.data_id order by t.data_id DESC 
) t2 WHERE ticketnumber = {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.ticketnumber}}

select ticketnumber,concat(ifnull(agentname ,''),"于",ifnull(processtime ,''),ifnull(action ,''),ifnull(nextagentname,'')) as log from (select t.*, u.name as agentname ,GROUP_CONCAT(t1.name) as nextagentname  from lddb.ticket_logs t left join lddb.users u on t.agentid =u.userid left join lddb.users t1 on FIND_IN_SET(t1.userid, t.nextagentid) group by t.data_id order by t.data_id DESC 
) t2 WHERE ticketnumber = {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.ticketnumber}}

SELECT tickettitle
	,a.ticketnumber
	,businesssys
	,reporterid
	,b.name AS reportername
	,reporterorg
	,businesscat
	,businesspriority
	,reoporttime
	,expectfinishtime
	,ticketstatus
	,tlog.agentid
	,a.currentperson
	,f.currentpersonname
	,avatar
FROM lddb.tickets AS a
LEFT JOIN lddb.users AS b ON a.reporterid = b.userid
LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT t.dataid,t.currentperson
		,GROUP_CONCAT(t1.name) AS currentpersonname
	FROM lddb.tickets t
	LEFT JOIN lddb.users t1 ON FIND_IN_SET(t1.userid, t.currentperson)
	GROUP BY t.dataid
	) AS f ON a.currentperson = f.currentperson and a.dataid = f.dataid
inner JOIN (select distinct agentid, ticketnumber from lddb.ticket_logs WHERE agentid = '{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}' and action NOT IN ('创建工单，待处理人是') ORDER by ticketnumber DESC limit 100)  as tlog on a.ticketnumber = tlog.ticketnumber 
ORDER BY ticketnumber DESC

SELECT tickettitle
	,a.ticketnumber
	,businesssys
	,reporterid
	,b.name AS reportername
	,reporterorg
	,businesscat
	,businesspriority
	,reoporttime
	,expectfinishtime
	,ticketstatus
	,tlog.agentid
	,a.currentperson
	,f.currentpersonname
	,avatar
FROM lddb.tickets AS a
LEFT JOIN lddb.users AS b ON a.reporterid = b.userid
LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT t.dataid,t.currentperson
		,GROUP_CONCAT(t1.name) AS currentpersonname
	FROM lddb.tickets t
	LEFT JOIN lddb.users t1 ON FIND_IN_SET(t1.userid, t.currentperson)
	GROUP BY t.dataid
	) AS f ON a.currentperson = f.currentperson and a.dataid = f.dataid
inner JOIN (select distinct agentid, ticketnumber from lddb.ticket_logs WHERE agentid = '{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}' and action NOT IN ('创建工单，待处理人是') ORDER by ticketnumber DESC limit 100)  as tlog on a.ticketnumber = tlog.ticketnumber 
ORDER BY ticketnumber DESC

INSERT INTO lddb.ticket_logs (
	ticketnumber,
	action,
	agentid,

	nextagentid

VALUES (
	'{{ticketDetails.data.ticketNumber}}',

update lddb.tickets set
     tickettitle ='{{ticketDetails.data.ticketTitle}}',
	   businesssys ='{{businessSys.selectedOptionValue}}',
	   businesscat ='{{businessCat.selectedOptionValue}}',
	   businesspriority ='{{businessPriority.selectedOptionValue}}',
	   expectfinishtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.expectedTime}}',
	   actualfinishtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.actualFinishTime}}',
	   ticketstatus ='已关闭',
	   questionsolution ='{{ticketDetails.data.questionSolution}}',
	   currentperson ='{{currentPerson.selectedOptionValues.join()}}',
	   actualtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.actualTime}}',
	   estimatedtime ='{{ticketDetails.data.estimatedTime}}',
	   updaterid ='{{appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}',
	   updatetime ='{{moment().format()}}'
	where ticketnumber = '{{ticketDetails.data.ticketNumber}}'

actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO lddb.audit_logs (
	userid,
	device,
	application,
	page,
	pagename,
	createtime,
	requesturl
)
VALUES (
	'{{!appsmith.store.qwuser || !appsmith.store.qwuser.userid?'anonymous':appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}',
	'pc',
	'工单管理系统',
	'{{appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0]}}',
	'{{appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f83a'?'工作台':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f836'?'提交工单':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f839'?'工单详情':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f835'?'工单查询':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f834'?'系统清单':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f837'?'运维人员':
	  (''))))))}}',
	'{{moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss')}}',
	'{{appsmith.URL.fullPath}}'
);

actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO lddb.audit_logs (
	userid,
	device,
	application,
	page,
	pagename,
	createtime,
	requesturl
)
VALUES (
	'{{!appsmith.store.qwuser || !appsmith.store.qwuser.userid?'anonymous':appsmith.store.qwuser.userid}}',
	'pc',
	'工单管理系统',
	'{{appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0]}}',
	'{{appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f83a'?'工作台':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f836'?'提交工单':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f839'?'工单详情':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f835'?'工单查询':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f834'?'系统清单':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f837'?'运维人员':
	  (''))))))}}',
	'{{moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss')}}',
	'{{appsmith.URL.fullPath}}'
);

jsonPathKeys:
appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f83a'?'工作台':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f836'?'提交工单':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f839'?'工单详情':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f835'?'工单查询':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f834'?'系统清单':
	  (appsmith.URL.fullPath.split('/')[5].split('?')[0] == 'page-63903cb88b9c0f192317f837'?'运维人员':
	  (''))))))
